Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1998
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Tony Phillips

I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
Joe Girardi
